claim: Akbar was a patron of art.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Abu ` l-Fath Jalal-ud-din Muhammad  (  15 October 1542 -- 27 October 1605  )  , popularly known as Akbar I  (  -LSB- əkbər -RSB- , literally `` the great ''  )  and later Akbar the Great , was the third Mughal emperor , who reigned from 1556 to 1605 .

claim: Akbar was a patron of art.

claim: Akbar was a patron of art.

claim: Akbar was a patron of art.

claim: Akbar was a patron of art.

claim: Akbar was a patron of art.

claim: Akbar was a patron of art.

claim: Akbar was a patron of art.

claim: Akbar was a patron of art.

claim: Akbar was a patron of art.
